project_abstract.cdata: The project would include: (i) the development by corporation of seven ranches of 12,000 ha each, which would develop systems of livestock production and mixed farming, through field trials, which would stimulate increased livestock production in the outer islands; (ii) a small pilot program of credit to medium income private farmers located in the project areas, who would utilize the knowledge developed on the government ranches; and (iii) technical assistance for on-ranch training abroad of corporation executive personnel and preparation of another livestock project.
